attributes.title: Minecraft - Episode 299 - Sky Factory Part 38
attributes.caption: On today's episode, Gavin overdecorates, Michael takes donations, Jeremy upgrades some armor, Ryan and Jack have some chance cube misfortune, and Simple Geoff has trouble getting his trees up.
attributes.description:
Thank you for stopping by the Lad Pad. Please consider a hearty donation. Each monies we get helps keep the decobench running.

On today's episode, Gavin overdecorates, Michael takes donations, Jeremy upgrades some armor, Ryan and Jack have some chance cube misfortune, and Simple Geoff has trouble getting his trees up.
attributes.display_title: Minecraft - Episode 299 - Sky Factory Part 38

attributes.title: Minecraft - Episode 300 - Sky King Ryan
attributes.caption: It's Minecraft episode 300! In celebration, Achievement Hunter is finally ready to crown a new king (178 episodes later).
attributes.description: It's Minecraft episode 300! In celebration, Achievement Hunter is finally ready to crown a new king (178 episodes later).
attributes.display_title: Minecraft - Episode 300 - Sky King Ryan

attributes.title: Minecraft - Episode 301 - Sky Factory Part 40
attributes.caption: Achievement Hunter is finally facing off against the guardian of chaos, the Chaos Dragon.
attributes.description:
Achievement Hunter is finally facing off against the guardian of chaos, the Chaos Dragon.

On today's episode, Ryan fights the Chaos Dragon, Jack fights the Chaos Dragon, Gavin fights the Chaos Dragon, Jeremy fights the Chaos Dragon, Michael fights the Chaos Dragon, Lindsay attempts to fight the Chaos Dragon, and Geoff hangs out with Millie the chicken.
attributes.display_title: Minecraft - Episode 301 - Sky Factory Part 40

attributes.title: Let's Play Minecraft - Episode 302 - Sky Factory Finale (Part 41)
attributes.caption: With the Chaos Dragon defeated, the crew decides to build one last thing before leaving the Sky Factory, the Draconic Reactor.
attributes.description:
With the Chaos Dragon defeated, the crew decides to build one last thing before leaving the Sky Factory, the Draconic Reactor.

On today's episode, Ryan, Jeremy, and Jack do all the heavy lifting, Lindsay goes nuts for donuts, Michael achieves perfect stealth, Gavin pushes a bad button, and Geoff lives the good life in the New World.
attributes.display_title: Let's Play Minecraft - Episode 302 - Sky Factory Finale (Part 41)

attributes.title: Minecraft - Episode 303 - Ya Dead, Ya Dead (Part 1)
attributes.caption: After 300 episodes, the boys and girl of Achievement Hunter feel they're pretty good at Minecraft. Today, they're ready to see how they fare against Minecraft's hardest difficulty with no respawns. In this world, when ya dead, ya dead.
attributes.description: After 300 episodes, the boys and girl of Achievement Hunter feel they're pretty good at Minecraft. Today, they're ready to see how they fare against Minecraft's hardest difficulty with no respawns. In this world, when ya dead, ya dead.
attributes.display_title: Minecraft - Episode 303 - Ya Dead, Ya Dead (Part 1)

attributes.title: Minecraft - Episode 304 - Tree Boys (YDYD Part 2)
attributes.caption: The remaining eight struggle for survival as they do some hardcore mining, befriend wildlife, become tree boys, and make a basement hideaway.
attributes.description: The remaining eight struggle for survival as they do some hardcore mining, befriend wildlife, become tree boys, and make a basement hideaway.
attributes.display_title: Minecraft - Episode 304 - Tree Boys (YDYD Part 2)

attributes.title: Minecraft - Episode 305 - Gavin Two (YDYD Part 3)
attributes.caption: Ya Dead Ya Dead gets deadly this week. The tree boys try to make it home, the mole boys continue with their buttons, and Geoff makes a new Gavin after the first one is damaged beyond repair.
attributes.description: Ya Dead Ya Dead gets deadly this week. The tree boys try to make it home, the mole boys continue with their buttons, and Geoff makes a new Gavin after the first one is damaged beyond repair.
attributes.display_title: Minecraft - Episode 305 - Gavin Two (YDYD Part 3)

attributes.title: Minecraft - Episode 306 - Michael's Epic Journey (YDYD Part 4)
attributes.caption: After the bloodbath in part 3, Michael Jones is the only one left alive in all of Minecraft. Watch his epic quest and see if he can make it all alone.
attributes.description: After the bloodbath in part 3, Michael Jones is the only one left alive in all of Minecraft. Watch his epic quest and see if he can make it all alone.
attributes.display_title: Minecraft - Episode 306 - Michael's Epic Journey (YDYD Part 4)

attributes.title: Minecraft - Episode 307 - Achieveland
attributes.caption: With Achievement City left completely uninhabitable, Achievement Hunter sets out to find their new home, Achieveland.
attributes.description: With Achievement City left completely uninhabitable, Achievement Hunter sets out to find their new home, Achieveland.
attributes.display_title: Minecraft - Episode 307 - Achieveland

attributes.title: Minecraft - Episode 308 - Beachside Property (Achieveland #2)
attributes.caption: The gang continues their Achieveland adventure, shaping up Achievement Cove into a livable environment. And new homes mean housewarming gifts.
attributes.description: The gang continues their Achieveland adventure, shaping up Achievement Cove into a livable environment. And new homes mean housewarming gifts.
attributes.display_title: Minecraft - Episode 308 - Beachside Property (Achieveland #2)

attributes.title: Minecraft - Episode 309 - Messin' With Jacksquatch (Achieveland #3)
attributes.caption: It's pretty dusky in Achieveland this week, and there seems to be an especially intense concentration of duskiness in the middle of Jack's house.
attributes.description: It's pretty dusky in Achieveland this week, and there seems to be an especially intense concentration of duskiness in the middle of Jack's house.
attributes.display_title: Minecraft - Episode 309 - Messin' With Jacksquatch (Achieveland #3)

attributes.title: Minecraft - Episode 310 - Chomping List
attributes.caption: Now that the gang's a bit more settled into Achievement Cove, it's time for a competition. Whoever collects the most unique food items by the end of the episode wins. The winner may even receive a certain golden tower.
attributes.description: Now that the gang's a bit more settled into Achievement Cove, it's time for a competition. Whoever collects the most unique food items by the end of the episode wins. The winner may even receive a certain golden tower.
attributes.display_title: Minecraft - Episode 310 - Chomping List

attributes.title: Minecraft - Episode 311 - Bone Tax (Achieveland #4)
attributes.caption: The crew continue building their Achievement Cove properties, pay the bone tax, and consider changing their names.
attributes.description: The crew continue building their Achievement Cove properties, pay the bone tax, and consider changing their names.
attributes.display_title: Minecraft - Episode 311 - Bone Tax (Achieveland #4)

attributes.title: The Eggsorcism of House Jones: Achieveland #5 - Minecraft (#312)
attributes.caption: The crew finish building up their Achiveland houses, the giant AH logo, and the Tower of Pimps while reminiscing about the finest media the internet has to offer.
attributes.description:
When Lindsay is convinced her house is haunted, she calls in the best man for an exorcism: the guy who looks most like the J-Man.

The crew finish building up their Achiveland houses, the giant AH logo, and the Tower of Pimps while reminiscing about the finest media the internet has to offer.
attributes.display_title: The Eggsorcism of House Jones: Achieveland #5 - Minecraft (#312)

attributes.title: Wipeout X - Minecraft (#313)
attributes.caption: A new obstable course based on the hit game show, Wipeout, has just been built in Achieveland. Time to compete for the Tower of Pimps (and try not to fail too hard in the process).
attributes.description: A new obstable course based on the hit game show, Wipeout, has just been built in Achieveland. Time to compete for the Tower of Pimps (and try not to fail too hard in the process).
attributes.display_title: Wipeout X - Minecraft (#313)

attributes.title: Wipeout X Part 2 - Minecraft (#314)
attributes.caption: Three Wipeout competitors down. Four Wipeout competitors left. Only one can take home the Tower of Pimps.
attributes.description: Three Wipeout competitors down. Four Wipeout competitors left. Only one can take home the Tower of Pimps.
attributes.display_title: Wipeout X Part 2 - Minecraft (#314)

attributes.title: Ghastly Betrayal- Minecraft (#315)
attributes.caption: The gang tries to bring a Ghast through a Nether Portal.
attributes.description: The gang tries to bring a Ghast through a Nether Portal.
attributes.display_title: Ghastly Betrayal- Minecraft (#315)

attributes.title: Who Burned Gav's House Down? - Minecraft - Ghastly Betrayal 2 (#316)
attributes.caption: The gang tries to bring a Ghast through a Nether Portal a second time. Somebody sets Gavin's house ablaze.
attributes.description: The gang tries to bring a Ghast through a Nether Portal a second time. Somebody sets Gavin's house ablaze.
attributes.display_title: Who Burned Gav's House Down? - Minecraft - Ghastly Betrayal 2 (#316)

attributes.title: Michael's Prison Village - Minecraft - Neighborhood Watch (#317)
attributes.caption: The guys decide to bulk up their defences in Achieveland's scenic Achievement Cove. Michael ruins the property value by turning a village into a prison.
attributes.description: The guys decide to bulk up their defences in Achieveland's scenic Achievement Cove. Michael ruins the property value by turning a village into a prison.
attributes.display_title: Michael's Prison Village - Minecraft - Neighborhood Watch (#317)

attributes.title: Drowning in Chickens - Minecraft - New Petting Zoo (#318)
attributes.caption: It's time for another competiton for the tower. Whoever captures the most different friendly animals wins! Can everyone manage to get at least a chicken?
attributes.description: It's time for another competiton for the tower. Whoever captures the most different friendly animals wins! Can everyone manage to get at least a chicken?
attributes.display_title: Drowning in Chickens - Minecraft - New Petting Zoo (#318)

attributes.title: Codename: Hot Dog - Minecraft (#319)
attributes.caption: The gang decides to do a mystery build to Achievement Cove. How quickly can you figure out what a hot dog is?
attributes.description: The gang decides to do a mystery build to Achievement Cove. How quickly can you figure out what a hot dog is?
attributes.display_title: Codename: Hot Dog - Minecraft (#319)

attributes.title: ROYGBaa the Rainbow Sheep - Minecraft (#320)
attributes.caption: The boys compete to see who will be the first to collect every color of sheep in Minecraft. For the sake of time, the pens will be full of sheep Lannisters.
attributes.description: The boys compete to see who will be the first to collect every color of sheep in Minecraft. For the sake of time, the pens will be full of sheep Lannisters.
attributes.display_title: ROYGBaa the Rainbow Sheep - Minecraft (#320)

attributes.title: The Water Boatman - Minecraft - ROYGBaa Part 2  (#321)
attributes.caption: The competiton for every colored sheep in Minecraft continues. Today, cactus will be nabbed, sheep will be sheeped, and one person will win the Tower of Pimps.
attributes.description: The competiton for every colored sheep in Minecraft continues. Today, cactus will be nabbed, sheep will be sheeped, and one person will win the Tower of Pimps.
attributes.display_title: The Water Boatman - Minecraft - ROYGBaa Part 2  (#321)

attributes.title: Going Floor-Loco in Candy Land - Minecraft (#322)
attributes.caption: The gang's competing for the tower once again by playing Candy Land in Minecraft. Normally that game is for 3 year olds, but our boys came up with a clever twist to make it more of a challenge (see Off Topic 138).
attributes.description: The gang's competing for the tower once again by playing Candy Land in Minecraft. Normally that game is for 3 year olds, but our boys came up with a clever twist to make it more of a challenge (see Off Topic 138).
attributes.display_title: Going Floor-Loco in Candy Land - Minecraft (#322)

attributes.title: The Mukbat Shack - Minecraft - Galacticraft Part 1 (#323)
attributes.caption: The AH Crew is returning to Galacticraft and going to space! Eventually! First they've gotta build a house. (Plot Spoilers for Mulan 2)
attributes.description: The AH Crew is returning to Galacticraft and going to space! Eventually! First they've gotta build a house. (Plot Spoilers for Mulan 2)
attributes.display_title: The Mukbat Shack - Minecraft - Galacticraft Part 1 (#323)

attributes.title: Exotic Ore - Minecraft - Galacticraft Part 2 (#324)
attributes.caption: Michael and Alfredo are put in charge of the house while the others gather resources and do "real work". They make some bold design choices that are, well, what's important is that they tried.
attributes.description: Michael and Alfredo are put in charge of the house while the others gather resources and do "real work". They make some bold design choices that are, well, what's important is that they tried.
attributes.display_title: Exotic Ore - Minecraft - Galacticraft Part 2 (#324)

attributes.title: Woke Up On Fire - Minecraft - Lava Wall X (#325)
attributes.caption: War never changes, but the Lava Wall does! The boys revisit the classic game with some new twists. It's Lads verse Gents in this triple-layer multiplayer mayhem.
attributes.description: War never changes, but the Lava Wall does! The boys revisit the classic game with some new twists. It's Lads verse Gents in this triple-layer multiplayer mayhem.
attributes.display_title: Woke Up On Fire - Minecraft - Lava Wall X (#325)

attributes.title: Machines of War - Minecraft - Lava Wall X Part 2 (#326)
attributes.caption: The battle rages on with casualties on both sides. Ryan construct's an effective death machine, while Michael becomes unhinged.
attributes.description: The battle rages on with casualties on both sides. Ryan construct's an effective death machine, while Michael becomes unhinged.
attributes.display_title: Machines of War - Minecraft - Lava Wall X Part 2 (#326)

attributes.title: Be I Pimping? - Minecraft - Galacticraft Part 3 (#327)
attributes.caption: The gang divides into two teams. Team Smart People do science talk and build stuff while Team Dumb People work the mines, hunting for diamonds and redstone.
attributes.description: The gang divides into two teams. Team Smart People do science talk and build stuff while Team Dumb People work the mines, hunting for diamonds and redstone.
attributes.display_title: Be I Pimping? - Minecraft - Galacticraft Part 3 (#327)

attributes.title: Duvet Bidet - Minecraft - Galacticraft Part 4 (#328)
attributes.caption: Gavin's bullied his way into Galacticraft and taken a cozy position on the Dig Crew. Ryan goes on a quest for rubber while Michael and Lindsay build a "fence."
attributes.description: Gavin's bullied his way into Galacticraft and taken a cozy position on the Dig Crew. Ryan goes on a quest for rubber while Michael and Lindsay build a "fence."
attributes.display_title: Duvet Bidet - Minecraft - Galacticraft Part 4 (#328)

attributes.title: Tower of Ghosts - Minecraft - Galacticraft Part 5 (#329)
attributes.caption: The boys are recovering from the events of Part 4 and are in pursuit of a new energy source.
attributes.description: The boys are recovering from the events of Part 4 and are in pursuit of a new energy source. Gavin leaves Dig Squad to become his own Dig Man, and Jeremy finds a whole bunch of strange oddities.
attributes.display_title: Tower of Ghosts - Minecraft - Galacticraft Part 5 (#329)

attributes.title: We Dug Too Deep - Minecraft - Galacticraft Part 6 (#330)
attributes.caption: The AH Crew got too greedy and dug too deep. Now they've awaken all the Nether's spooky spirits and icky bones.
attributes.description: The AH Crew got too greedy and dug too deep. Now they've awaken all the Nether's spooky spirits and icky bones.
attributes.display_title: We Dug Too Deep - Minecraft - Galacticraft Part 6 (#330)

attributes.title: Riddle of Steel - Minecraft - Galacticraft Part 7 (#331)
attributes.caption: Dig Team constructs the new Space Facility for the eventual launch. Meanwhile, Ryan begins to buckle under the pressure.
attributes.description: Dig Team constructs the new Space Facility for the eventual launch. Meanwhile, Ryan begins to buckle under the pressure.
attributes.display_title: Riddle of Steel - Minecraft - Galacticraft Part 7 (#331)

attributes.title: Finna Ta Fly - Minecraft - Galacticraft Part 8 (#332)
attributes.caption: Simple Geoff returns from his mission for magic beans to help the crew construct their first rocket. But first, he needs to learn the ropes! Alfredo also falls victim to the reFUPAning.
attributes.description: Simple Geoff returns from his mission for magic beans to help the crew construct their first rocket. But first, he needs to learn the ropes! Alfredo also falls victim to the reFUPAning.
attributes.display_title: Finna Ta Fly - Minecraft - Galacticraft Part 8 (#332)

attributes.title: The Pearl Curse - Minecraft - Galacticraft Part 9 (#333)
attributes.caption: The gang continues preparation for their first launch by constructing teleporters! Meanwhile, Michael and Jeremy play with ghost pearls.
attributes.description: The gang continues preparation for their first launch by constructing teleporters! Meanwhile, Michael and Jeremy play with ghost pearls.
attributes.display_title: The Pearl Curse - Minecraft - Galacticraft Part 9 (#333)

attributes.title: To the Moon! - Minecraft - Galacticraft Part 10 (#334)
attributes.caption: With their space rockets built and slime shoes on tight, the AH Rocket Boys will become Rocket Men for their first Galacticraft launch!
attributes.description: With their space rockets built and slime shoes on tight, the AH Rocket Boys will become Rocket Men for their first Galacticraft launch!
attributes.display_title: To the Moon! - Minecraft - Galacticraft Part 10 (#334)

attributes.title: Rescue Mission - Minecraft - Galacticraft Part 11 (#335)
attributes.caption: The Moon Team is stranded and in desperate need of rescue. Now it's up to NASA to bring them home!
attributes.description: The Moon Team is stranded and in desperate need of rescue. Now it's up to NASA to bring them home!
attributes.display_title: Rescue Mission - Minecraft - Galacticraft Part 11 (#335)

attributes.title: Gerrymandering in the Ballroom - Minecraft - Clue (#336)
attributes.caption: The AH Crew is back in Achieveland for Halloween when there's been a murder at the Mansion. Time to play some Clue to solve the mystery!
attributes.description: The AH Crew is back in Achieveland for Halloween when there's been a murder at the Mansion. Time to play some Clue to solve the mystery!
attributes.display_title: Gerrymandering in the Ballroom - Minecraft - Clue (#336)

attributes.title: The Killer Revealed - Minecraft - Clue Part 2 (#337)
attributes.caption: The pieces are beginning to fall into place, but the murderer is still loose. Find out if one of our detectives can solve this Clue mystery!
attributes.description: The pieces are beginning to fall into place, but the murderer is still loose. Find out if one of our detectives can solve this Clue mystery!
attributes.display_title: The Killer Revealed - Minecraft - Clue Part 2 (#337)

attributes.title: Space Mutiny - Minecraft - Galacticraft Part 12 (#338)
attributes.caption: Moon Team is ready for Launch Attempt 2 with their completed space suits. But they're going to have whole new challenges once they land!
attributes.description: Moon Team is ready for Launch Attempt 2 with their completed space suits. But they're going to have whole new challenges once they land!
attributes.display_title: Space Mutiny - Minecraft - Galacticraft Part 12 (#338)

attributes.title: Boss Fight - Minecraft - Galacticraft Part 13 (#339)
attributes.caption: The Moon Team grows in size and strength! But will it be enough to take on their first Galacticraft Dungeon?
attributes.description: The Moon Team grows in size and strength! But will it be enough to take on their first Galacticraft Dungeon?
attributes.display_title: Boss Fight - Minecraft - Galacticraft Part 13 (#339)

attributes.title: Sleep it Off - Minecraft - Galacticraft Part 14 (#340)
attributes.caption: Who knew there'd be harmful radiation in Space? Well, the AH Crew didn't, and now they'll need proper treatment. Or maybe just sleep it off!
attributes.description: Who knew there'd be harmful radiation in Space? Well, the AH Crew didn't, and now they'll need proper treatment. Or maybe just sleep it off!
attributes.display_title: Sleep it Off - Minecraft - Galacticraft Part 14 (#340)

attributes.title: Slug Club - Minecraft - Galacticraft Part 15 (#341)
attributes.caption: The AH Crew has colonized the Moon and is ready to explore Mars! But will they learn from their recent Lunar mistakes on the Red Planet?
attributes.description: The AH Crew has colonized the Moon and is ready to explore Mars! But will they learn from their recent Lunar mistakes on the Red Planet?
attributes.display_title: Slug Club - Minecraft - Galacticraft Part 15 (#341)

attributes.title: WE HAVE KIDS!?! - Minecraft - Galacticraft Part 16 (#342)
attributes.caption: The AH gang learns about the birds and the bees, Galacticraft style! Spoilers, there's a lot more like chickens and gold.
attributes.description: The AH gang learns about the birds and the bees, Galacticraft style! Spoilers, there's a lot more like chickens and gold.
attributes.display_title: WE HAVE KIDS!?! - Minecraft - Galacticraft Part 16 (#342)

attributes.title: Fishing Rodeo and Jamboree VII - Minecraft (#343)
attributes.caption: The gang goes to the dock for the annual Fishing Rodeo and Jamboree. With the aquatic update, whoever catches the most fish in buckets wins!
attributes.description: The gang goes to the dock for the annual Fishing Rodeo and Jamboree. With the aquatic update, whoever catches the most fish in buckets wins!
attributes.display_title: Fishing Rodeo and Jamboree VII - Minecraft (#343)

attributes.title: SANTA'S TRIALS - Christmas King Part 1 - Minecraft (#344)
attributes.caption: Santa has summoned the AH gang to the north pole to name a new Christmas King! First to win four challenges will win the tower and title.
attributes.description: Santa has summoned the AH gang to the north pole to name a new Christmas King! First to win four challenges will win the tower and title.
attributes.display_title: SANTA'S TRIALS - Christmas King Part 1 - Minecraft (#344)

attributes.title: THE NEW KING - Christmas King Part 2 - Minecraft (#345)
attributes.caption: The challenges continue, and it's still anyone's game.  Find out who will win the tower and be crowned the next Christmas King!
attributes.description: The challenges continue, and it's still anyone's game.  Find out who will win the tower and be crowned the next Christmas King!
attributes.display_title: THE NEW KING - Christmas King Part 2 - Minecraft (#345)
